body:
So Im Currently Playing a walls game, And im kit stomper. I built Really high and stomped on a team of 4 and killed them all. But, It says they were killed by themselves. So i didn't get the Kill. Wondering if this issue could be fixed. 

   Part II:
Yesterday i was teamed with Other Skype friends Who were also stomper. I was on the ground and they were Building up. One was shot off and landed by me and killed me.  We were on the same team and stomper killed me. 

    Just a heads up Walls players and stomper users.

title: Stomper Issue
